name: Zoo + Ocean Handtracking ZOSU Passthrough
summary:
Create a Zoo and Ocean in your home with over 160 creatures
- passthrough enabled to see animals in your actual surroundings in mixed reality, create a zoo or ocean aquarium in your home
- handtracking enabled to allow hand placement of animals (controllers work as well)
- animals are placeable and moveable with random spawn/remove, bonus test levels to copy/enlarge
- combo of the best of zoo and ocean home passthrough with over 20 scenes of animals to enjoy
-- animals:100+ ocean, 60+ land/air
